definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
(idiom) complacency leads to loss, modesty brings profit/pride comes before a fall
pinyin: man3 zhao1 sun3 , qian1 shou4 yi4

sentences.english: Vietnam, for example, has already been a beneficiary of escalating labor costs in China.
sentences.chinese: 例如越南已经成为了中国劳动力成为上升的受益者。

sentences.english: Which classes benefit most from Jewelcrafting?
sentences.chinese: 哪个职业将会从宝石学中受益最大？

sentences.english: The following items are examples of the benefits operators have achieved by using the component removal reduction (CRR) process.
sentences.chinese: 以下内容是使用CRR程序后受益航空公司的实例。

sentences.english: Gambling shavings inadvertently found that the beneficiary on SunQiMing policy turned out to be yourself.
sentences.chinese: 奕茹无意中发现，孙启鸣保单上的受益人竟然是自己。

sentences.english: Algae feed on the nitrogen-rich waste products generated by the embryos.
sentences.chinese: 藻类以胚胎产生的富含氮的废弃物受益。

sentences.english: But a large part of the planetâ  s population has not yet benefited from these developments.
sentences.chinese: 但地球上很大一部分人口还没有从这些发展中受益。

sentences.english: The filter-through of stimulus cash to the pachinko parlours has historical precedent.
sentences.chinese: 弹球馆通过现金刺激计划受益是有历史先例。

sentences.english: China has benefitted from three major advantages after Mao Zedong's death in 1976.
sentences.chinese: 1976年毛逝世后，中国受益于三大主要优势。

sentences.english: Just as rewarding as the play was the science forum held afterwards.
sentences.chinese: 像演出一样令人受益的是后来召开的科学论坛。

sentences.english: Quick question, I think people are curious to know what the city residence can benefit from this new campus.
sentences.chinese: 貌似大家都比较关心民众能从新园区中受益吗？

sentences.english: I benefited from my mother's advice.
The same way travel is also the beneficiary of the merger.
sentences.chinese: 同程旅游同样是此次并购的受益方。

sentences.english: Individuals and society will benefit from the cultivation of independent self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 无论是个体还是社会都将受益于独立自尊心的培养。

sentences.english: Where is that low volatility coming from?
sentences.chinese: 那些稳定的受益是从何尔来的呢？

sentences.english: Finally, we benefit from each other emotionally.
sentences.chinese: 最终，我们都受益于彼此的感情交流。

sentences.english: To look at ourselves in the mirror often will be very beneficial.
sentences.chinese: 经常照镜自省将让我们受益匪浅。

definition: to profit from sth/to get benefit
extent of a rise (in prices etc)/amount of increase/growth (typically expressed as a percentage)
variant of 復甦|复苏[fu4 su1]/to recover (health, economic)/to resuscitate/anabiosis
to regard as having good prospects
